mapper.select: SELECT PS_ID, PS_NM, REMARK, PS_SEX_CD, PS_BIRTH FROM PERSON WHERE PS_ID = #{id}

SELECT PS_ID, PS_NM, REMARK, PS_SEX_CD, PS_BIRTH FROM PERSON WHERE 1=1
AND PS_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND PS_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY PS_ID ASC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PERSON WHERE 1=1
AND PS_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND PS_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
